channel.title: Cash Leak - Stores
channel.description:
Right, on my server I need to edit prices of my donation items such as godswords, vesta etc.
I need it so I can modify my Alch prices. They also sell to store for 1.2Bill for some reason? base - Delta Brandon_hill@hotmail.co.uk I can show you some of the things and im able to accses teamviewer. Help would really be appreciated. thankyou :)
[code] item = 746 Zamorak_godsword A_black_obsidian_dagger,_it_has_a_strange_aura_about_it. 400000000 2000000000 400000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 [/code]
It shows that it sells from store 2B Right? (2000M) and 40M Alch. It alches for 666M ...It's compiled, updated no errors... :( Any idea? Thanks :)

item.title: Cash Leak - Stores
item.dc:creator: @bhill bhill
item.description:
@bhill wrote:

Wait you mean it interlocks for example store price changes the alch/sell too?

Read full topic

item.title: Cash Leak - Stores
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

i noticed that with some items when you change the 1st price it changes the alch price and when you change the second price it changes the store price and stuff like that, try messing around with it until you can get it to the price you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Cash Leak - Stores

item.description:
@bhill wrote:

Right, on my server I need to edit prices of my donation items such as godswords, vesta etc.

I need it so I can modify my Alch prices. They also sell to store for 1.2Bill for some reason? base - Delta Brandon_hill@hotmail.co.uk I can show you some of the things and im able to accses teamviewer. Help would really be appreciated. thankyou

It shows that it sells from store 2B Right? (2000M) and 40M Alch. It alches for 666M …It’s compiled, updated no errors… Any idea? Thanks
